member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentCursor.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Begin a new transaction for this cursor.

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentCursor.BeginReadOnlyTransaction
member.summary: Begin a new transaction for this cursor. This is the cheapest transaction type because it returns a struct and no separate commit call has to be made.

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentCursor.Flush
member.summary: Generate a null database update that we can wrap in a non-lazy transaction.

property data

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.AddEntity(System.Type)
member.summary: Create a new entity of the specified type, the entity will be blank, all properties with default values
member.param: Type of entity to create, this must support IPersistEntity

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.AddEntity(System.Type,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new entity of the specified type, the entity will be blank, all properties with default values The entity label will be as specified, an exception will be raised if the label is already in use
member.param: Type of entity to create, this must support IPersistIfcEntity

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.TrySeekEntityLabel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified entity label is present in the table, assumes the current index has been set to by primary key (SetPrimaryIndex)
member.param: The entity label to lookup

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.TrySeekEntityType(System.Int16,Xbim.Common.XbimInstanceHandle@)
member.summary: Trys to move to the first entity of the specified type, assumes the current index has been set to order by type (SetOrderByType)

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.TrySeekEntityType(System.Int16,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Looks up an entity index to see if the secondary key exists
member.param: The Ifc Type
The secondary key
The indexed entity label

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.TrySeekEntityType(System.Int16,Xbim.Common.XbimInstanceHandle@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Trys to move to the first entity of the specified type, assumes the current index has been set to order by type (SetOrderByType) Secondary keys are specific to the type and defined as IfcAttributes in the class declaration
member.param: the type of entity to look up
Secondary key on the search
member.returns: Returns an instance handle to the first or an empty handle if not found

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.GetInstanceHandle
member.summary: returns the instance handle for the object at the current cursor position. Assumes the index has been set to the correct position and the current index is SetOrderByType

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.GetProperties
member.summary: Gets the property values of the entity from the current record
member.returns: byte array of the property data in binary ifc format

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor.RetrieveCount
member.summary: Retrieve the count of entity items in the database from the globals table.
member.returns: The number of items in the database.

member.summary: Update the count of entity in the globals table. This is done with EscrowUpdate so that there won't be any write conflicts.

member.summary: Commit the transaction.

member.summary: Commit the transaction.

member.name: T:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel
member.summary: IModel implementation for Esent DB based model support

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.UserDefinedId
member.summary: An identifier that an application can use to identify this model uniquely

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.ModelFactors
member.summary: Model wide factors, precision etc.

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.#ctor
member.summary: Only inherited models can call parameter-less constructor and it is their responsibility to call Init() as the very first thing.

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.CodePageOverride
member.summary: Some applications do not comply with the standard and used the Windows code page for text. This property gives the possibility to override the character encoding when reading ifc. default value = -1 - by standard http://www.buildingsmart-tech.org/implementation/get-started/string-encoding/string-encoding-decoding-summary

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.Instances
member.summary: Returns a collection of all instances only in the model

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.FederatedInstances
member.summary: Returns a collection of all instances in the model and all federated instances

member.name: E:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.EntityNew
member.summary: This event is fired every time new entity is created.

member.name: E:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.EntityModified
member.summary: This event is fired every time any entity is modified. If your model is not transactional it might not be called at all as the central point for all modifications is a transaction.

member.name: E:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.EntityDeleted
member.summary: This event is fired every time when entity gets deleted from model.

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.GetGeometryTable
member.summary: Starts a transaction to allow bulk updates on the geometry table, FreeGeometry Table should be called when no longer required

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.FreeTable(Xbim.IO.Esent.XbimGeometryCursor)
member.summary: Returns the table to the cache for reuse

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.FreeTable(Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentEntityCursor)
member.summary: Returns the table to the cache for reuse

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.FreeTable(Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentShapeGeometryCursor)
member.summary: Returns the table to the cache for reuse

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.FreeTable(Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentShapeInstanceCursor)
member.summary: Returns the table to the cache for reuse

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.ForEach``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Action{``0})
member.summary: Performs a set of actions on a collection of entities inside a single read only transaction This improves database performance for retrieving and accessing complex and deep objects

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.Delete(Xbim.Common.IPersistEntity)
member.summary: Registers an entity for deletion

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.GetInstanceVolatile(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an instance from the Model with the corresponding label but does not keep a cache of it This is a dangerous call as duplicate instances of the same object could happen Ony use when interating over the whole database for export etc The properties of the object are also loaded to improve performance If the instance is in the cache it is returned

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.GeometriesCount
member.summary: Returns the total number of Geometry objects in the model

members.member:
Creates a new Model and populates with instances from the specified file, Ifc, IfcXML, and IfcZip are all supported.
To create a new model from an existing XBIM file, use , or Name of the file containing the instances to import /// Name of the xbim file that will be created. If null the contents are loaded into memory and are not persistent
Flag indicating whether to keep the model open after creation, otherwise closes after import
The expected Ifc Format of the file. Inferred from extension when null Indicates whether the xbim database file should be deleted on close of model

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.CreateTemporaryModel(Xbim.Common.IEntityFactory)
member.summary: Creates an empty model using a temporary filename, the model will be deleted on close, unless SaveAs is called It will be returned open for read write operations

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.CreateModel(Xbim.Common.IEntityFactory,System.String,Xbim.IO.XbimDBAccess)
member.summary: Creates and opens a new Xbim Database
member.param: Entity factory to be used for deserialization
Name of the Xbim file

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.Close
member.summary: Closes the current model and releases all resources and instances

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.CacheStart
member.summary: Begins a cache of all data read from the model, improves performance where data is read many times

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.CacheClear
member.summary: Clears all read data in the cache

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.CacheStop
member.summary: Stops further caching of data and clears the current cache

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.Open(System.String,Xbim.IO.XbimDBAccess,Xbim.Common.ReportProgressDelegate)
member.summary: Opens an Xbim model only, to open Ifc, IfcZip and IfcXML files use the CreateFrom method

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.GetGeometryData(System.Int32,Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimGeometryType)
member.summary: Returns all the geometries for the geometry type Typically bounding box returns a single object, triangulated mesh mes may return multiple geometry meshes where an object is made of multiple materials

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.GeometrySupportLevel
member.summary: Returns the level of geometry supported in the model 0 = No geometry has been compiled in the model 1 = Triangulated Mesh only 2 = Polygonal geometry meshes supporting maps

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.InsertCopy``1(``0,Xbim.Common.XbimInstanceHandleMap,Xbim.IO.Esent.XbimReadWriteTransaction,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts a deep copy of the toCopy object into this model All property values are copied to the maximum depth Inverse properties are not copied
member.param: Instance to copy
Supply a dictionary of mappings if repeat copy insertions are to be made

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.InsertCopy``1(``0,Xbim.Common.XbimInstanceHandleMap,Xbim.Common.PropertyTranformDelegate,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Implementation of IModel variant of InsertCopy() function
member.typeparam: Type of the object to be inserted. This must be a type supported by this model
member.param: Object to copy
Mappings make sure object is only inserted once. You should use one instance of mappings for all InsertCopy() calls between two models
Delegate which can be used to transform properties. You can use this to filter out certain properties or referenced objects
If TRUE interse relations are also copied over. This may potentially bring over almost entire model if not controlled by propTransform delegate

If TRUE entity labels of inserted objects will be the same as the labels of original objects. This should be FALSE if you are inserting objects to existing model or if you are inserting objects from multiple source models into a single target model where entity labels may potentially clash.
member.returns: New created object in this model which is a deep copy of original object

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.EnsureGeometryTables
member.summary: Invoke the function before meshing to ensure database structure is available

member.name: F:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel._transactionReference
member.summary: Weak reference allows garbage collector to collect transaction once it goes out of the scope even if it is still referenced from model. This is important for the cases where the transaction is both not commited and not rolled back either.

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.IsFederation
member.summary: Returns true if the model contains reference models or the model has extension xBIMf

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.AllInstancesHandles
member.summary: Returns an enumerable of the handles to all entities in the model Note this includes entities that are in any federated models

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.Esent.EsentModel.InstanceHandles
member.summary: Returns a list of the handles to only the entities in this model Note this do NOT include entities that are in any federated models

member.summary: The session that has the transaction.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.PersistedEntityInstanceCache.GetOrCreateInstanceFromCache(System.Int32,System.Type,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Looks for this instance in the cache and returns it, if not found it creates a new instance and adds it to the cache

If not null creates an instance of this type, else creates an unknown Ifc Type
if not null populates all properties of the instance

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.Esent.PersistedEntityInstanceCache.GetInstanceFromStore(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads a blank instance from the database, do not call this before checking that the instance is in the instances cache If the entity has already been cached it will throw an exception This is not a undoable/reversable operation
member.param: Must be a positive value of the label
if true the properties of the object are loaded at the same time
if true the object is not cached, this is dangerous and can lead to object duplicates

if the entity has a key object, optimises to search for this handle
if specified this parameter overrides the expressType used internally (but not TIfcType) for filtering purposes
